DOC.brief_summary: The objective project establish 3D velocity mapping hepatic vasculature consistency . Specifically , investigator assess consistency quantitative data measure hepatic blood Inflow ( hepatic artery + portal vein ) outflow ( inferior vena cava differential flow ) . According mass conservation physical property , blood inflow must equal blood outflow . The relative gap measure value characterize consistency acquisition .
